nodes.text: Dragonets were creatures native to Tatooine and similar in appearance to armodragons. They were often found in lairs made of bones, and tended to follow large krayt dragons around, scavenging their prey. If provoked, they would often spit a green poison like substance. They belonged to the same genus as the rill and the scyk.
Jabba the Hutt's cook, Porcellus, used to cook dragonet flanks for his master.
Dragonets appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
